title: Present Value Calculator | Professional, Accessible & SEO-Optimized Tool

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Lump sum (discrete compounding): PV = \( \dfrac{\text{FV}}{\left(1+\dfrac{r}{m}\right)^{m t}} \) Lump sum (continuous compounding): PV = \( \text{FV}\, e^{-r t} \) Level annuity (ordinary): PV = \( P \times \dfrac{1-(1+\frac{r}{m})^{-m t}}{\frac{r}{m}} \) Annuity due: PV = \( P \times \dfrac{1-(1+\frac{r}{m})^{-m t}}{\frac{r}{m}} \times (1+\frac{r}{m}) \) Inflation adjustment (Fisher): \( r_{\text{real}} = \dfrac{1+r}{1+i} - 1 \)

variables.meaning: property tax (annual or monthly depending on input)
